bv.brainP5
Class TrainingSet

java.lang.Object
  bv.brainP5.TrainingSet

public class TrainingSet
extends Object

A training set is essentially a list of inputs with known outputs. The input and output count must match the NN's architecture or you will probably get an error or worse. Use with the train() function which takes in a training set.

bv301
